event.title: What's new in Mobile?
event.description:
Let's catch up about the cool new features, apis and toys for us developers to play with in Android 4.3, iOS 7, Mobile web, Windows 8, and Blackberry.

** update: we've struggled to get speakers and actually numbers are down on usual - we're putting it down to time of year. 

So plan is to move venue to Colston Yard and make it a let's chat about what's new in mobile rather than formal talks. 

I'll no doubt be busy reviewing the beer menu in deep contemplation about which Belgium beer to have, but just come over and say hi - especially if it;s your first time.  

Please update your RSVP status if you can't make it. 

See you there!
